name: Terro Vache: Number Guess Puzzle Game
name_original: Terro Vache: Number Guess Puzzle Game
description:
Terro Vache : Number Guess Puzzle Game

TerroVache is a new ORIGINAL puzzle game where you need to find the missing number BUT here we come the originality and difference that make TEEROVACHE special , PLAY it and try this new game idea.

INTRODUCTION :

Welcome in Terro Vache game ! To Solve the Game and guess the correct number you need To complete the puzzle by filling in all the numbers (from 0 to 9).

HOW TO PLAY :

Depending on the result of your try you will get :
TERRO : if there is a correct number in a correct place.
VACHE : if there is a correct number but not in the same place.
WRONG : if there is no correct number.

HELP AND HINTS :

You have three Hints you can use in this game. Use Them Wisely because this actions can't be undone. From the game menu option in the bottom, you will find the hints :

This Hint Will Give You A Correct Digit From The missing Number.

This Hint Will Add 10 Second For your timer

This Hint Will Stop The timer for 5 Seconds

DIFFICULTY LEVELS :

1- Easy : You Will Find A missed number That Contains 2 Digits.

2- Intermediate : You Will Find A missed number That Contains 3 Digits.

3- Hard : You Will Find A missed number That Contains 4 Digits.

4- Expert : You Will Find A missed number That Contains 5 Digits.

LEGAL NOTICE :

This Application Compile with policies and content.

For any queries regarding the terms of service see the setting option.

Any Suggestion or bug report is welcome. Please, Before writnig a bad review contact us by email at :
